resources.string: The purpose of the Goin\' Band Association is to provide support and resources to improve the quality and success of the Texas Tech University Band. The Goin\' Band Association will support the growth and quality of the Texas Tech University (Tech) Band by: developing and utilizing alumni resources, and pursuing resources from private individuals and institutions to provide financial and material support to the Tech Band program in an endeavor to promote and sustain the Tech Band as one of the premier band programs in the United States.
